sentences.english: The method to analyze the pressure gradient with mean radial velocity is used.
sentences.chinese: 本文提出了利用平均徑向速度分析壓力梯度的方法。

sentences.english: A novel pixel-level image fusion scheme based on gradient pyramid decomposition is presented.
sentences.chinese: 給出了基於梯度塔形分解的像素級圖像融合新方法。

sentences.english: The features of aeromagnetic gradient anomalies about the gold deposits are summarized.
sentences.chinese: 總結了金礦牀上航磁梯度異常的變化規律。

sentences.chinese: 工作參數對低頻段輻射的影響與負梯度區類似。

sentences.english: Some of these make logical sense, in terms of different temperature gradients.
sentences.chinese: 不同的溫度梯度或許可以部分解釋這種多樣性。

sentences.english: It will increase sharply with the decrease of the diameter of sieve pore.
sentences.chinese: 隨着篩孔直徑的減小，壓力梯度大大增加。

sentences.english: Gradient gel electrophoresis determine small, dense low-density lipoprotein in plasma of patients with coronary heart disease.
sentences.chinese: 梯度膠電泳法測定冠心病患者血漿小密低密度脂蛋白。

sentences.english: The programs adopt stratified constant-gradient method to approximately describe the sound velocity distribution.
sentences.chinese: 程序中採用分層等梯度近似來描述海洋中的聲速分佈。

sentences.english: The penetration and deposition of the droplets increase with the gradient wind.
sentences.chinese: 而彌霧機械梯度風的存在，有利於霧滴的穿透和沉積。

sentences.english: It is also shown that integral kernel operators can be expressedin terms of gradient and divergent operators.
sentences.chinese: 也證明了積分覈算子可用梯度與散度算子表出。

sentences.english: Advantageously, the structure further comprises a gradient refractive index layer.
sentences.chinese: 有利的是，該結構進一步包括梯度折射係數層。

sentences.english: Five zones were separated by improved discontinuous sucrose gradient centrifugation.

sentences.english: A thermoelastic model of functionally gradient material plates is developed.

sentences.english: In addition its excellent conductivity avoids the introduction of temperature gradients.
